## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Glyma.12G178500](https://legacy.soybase.org/sbt/search/search_results.php?category=FeatureName&version=Wm82.a4.v1&search_term=Glyma.12G178500)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GmbHLH57</u>
- **Gene Name:** bHLH transcription factor 57
- **Genome:** [Wm82.a4.v1](https://legacy.soybase.org/GlycineBlastPages/blast_descriptions.php)
- **Species:** *Glycine max*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - The expression of **GmbHLH57** and GmbHLH300, two Fe-related genes expressed in nodules of Gmysl7 mutants.
   - **GmbHLH57** and GmbHLH300 have roles in the nodule response to excessive Fe.
   - **GmbHLH57** to regulate iron uptake in soybean.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [iron](/tags/iron/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[fe](/tags/fe/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[nodules](/tags/nodules/)

   - [GmYSL7 controls iron uptake, allocation, and cellular response of nodules in soybean.]( https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/jipb.13364)&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.1111/jipb.13364](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/jipb.13364);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[36107150](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/36107150/)
